DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine how blood glucose changes after eating energy bars containing resistant starch type 4 compared with bars made with puffed wheat in healthy older adults.
DOC.brief_title: Resistant Starch on Glycemic Response in Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: To measure the blood glucose response, we collected blood samples before eating and 15, 30, 45, 60, 90 and 120 minutes after eating each bar. The incremental area under the curve was used to calculate glycemic index.
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy (not diagnosed with disease) Over 60 years of age Diagnosed with diabetes or other metabolic disorder Allergies to wheat Nonsmokers
